high_descs: Turn left and walk one step then turn left and walk so you are standing looking at the window.
Pick up the green cloth on the floor.
Turn around then walk to the wall then turn right and walk to the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a light as you hold a green washcloth.

high_descs: Pick up the green cloth on the floor
Turn around, walk straight to the wall, turn right, walk straight to the corner
Turn on the lamp on the night stand
anns.task_desc: Pick up the green cloth by the window, turn on the lamp on the night stand

high_descs: Turn around and walk up to the window behind you
Pick up the green cloth from the ground by the window
Turn around and walk over to the side table on the far side of the bed
Turn on the table lamp on the side table
anns.task_desc: Examine the green cloth under the light of the table lamp
